rules.justification: Object ID must be in free range. # Bug in LicenseFile
Field ID must be in free range. # Bug in LicenseFile
Do not have identifiers with quotes in the name. # It's default Microsoft naming - nothing to do about that.
Filter on field without key. # Bug in CodeCop
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo # Bug in codecop
Fields must use ApplicationArea property. # Bug in AL 4.0 extension
The record x should be modified # Bug in codecop
Name of vars and params must be suffixed. # pointless
Flowfield should be added to sift. # Bug in codecop
Flowfield should be added to sift. # Bug in codecop
